lostConnection: 您已失去与服务器的连接。
noLocalStorageSupport: 您的浏览器不支持本地存储或本地储存被禁用。
verified: 您的帐户尚未通过验证，请查看您的邮箱以获取验证邮件！
clearNotifications: 您确定要清除所有通知吗？
checkEmail: 检查您的邮箱并验证您的帐户。
checkSpam: 如果您找不到验证邮件，请务必检查您的垃圾邮件文件夹。
forgotDesc: 忘记了您的Sonoran CMS帐户密码？在下面输入您的电子邮件以重置您的密码。

common.label: 标签
common.blankTemplateDescription: 选择下方的"使用空白模板"将你的社区设置为空白，这意味着您将没有预设的部门、表单、名册等。
common.confirmTemplateDesc: 您可以选择您想要导入的内容和您不想导入的内容。底部的导入模式决定了您希望如何导入模板，比如替换或添加到您当前的部门和名册等。

confirmTemplateOptions.first: 导入并替换现有的部门和表单等。
confirmTemplateOptions.second: 导入并添加到现有的部门和表单等。

system.kickUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to kick another user from the community.
system.banUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to ban another user from the community.
system.changePermissionsExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to modify another user's permissions and account details from the community.
system.modifyComInfoExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize aspects of the Sonoran CMS platform such as Name, Image, Name/Identifier Format, etc.
system.modifyComFormsExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize the custom form templates that are used when users submit forms.
system.modifyComDeptsExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize departments and ranks like you are doing now.
system.modifyComRostersExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize the roster templates that are used to display the community's roster data.
system.modifyDiscordHooksExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize the Discord webhook settings for the community.
system.modifyIntegrationExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize and retrieve API credentials.
system.modifyToolbarExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize the toolbar settings for the community.
system.modifyPagesExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to customize the pages for the community.
system.modifyDocumentsExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to manage all documents within the Sonoran CMS Community Drive.
system.clockInOutExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to clock in and out.
system.archiveUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to archive another user from the community.
system.modifyTeamSpeakExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to modify the TeamSpeak integration settings.
system.modifyShieldExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to modify the Sonoran Shield settings.

forms.viewSubmittedExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to view all submitted forms of this type.
forms.editOwnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to edit their submissions of this type of form.
forms.changeStagesExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to change the stage of a submitted form of this type.
forms.modifyReplySettingsExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to change the reply settings of a submitted form of this type.
forms.replyExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to reply to a submitted form of this type if the reply settings allow for Basic replies.
forms.replyModExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to reply to a submitted form of this type if the reply settings allow for Basic or Mod replies.
forms.replyAdminExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to reply to a submitted form of this type if the reply settings allow for Basic, Mod, or Admin replies.
forms.submitExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to submit a form of this type.
forms.adminDeleteExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to fully delete a submission of this form.

rosters.viewExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to view this roster.
rosters.addPrimaryUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to add a user to the roster as a Primary Row (sorted initially before secondary rows).
rosters.addSecondaryUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to add a user to the roster as a Secondary Row (sorted after primary rows).
rosters.editPrimaryUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to edit a primary row in this roster.
rosters.editSecondaryUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to edit a secondary row in this roster.
rosters.removePrimaryUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to remove a primary row from the roster.
rosters.removeSecondaryUserExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to remove a secondary row from the roster.
rosters.viewModColumnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to view roster column(s) that are marked as Mod only.
rosters.viewAdminColumnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to view roster column(s) that are marked as Admin only.

calendars.viewExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to view events within this calendar category.
calendars.createExplanation: Granting this permisison will allow a user with this rank to create events within this calendar category.
calendars.removeExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to remove events within this calendar category.
calendars.editOtherExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to edit events within this calendar category.

servers.allowWhitelistExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user with this rank to be allowed through the API whitelist (if a user holds the block permission for this server they'll be blocked as block takes precedence).
servers.blockWhitelistExplanation: Granting this permission will block a user with this rank to be allowed through the API whitelist (if a user holds the allow permission for this server they'll still be blocked as it takes precedence).

profileFields.attachExplanation: Granting this permission will attach this profile field to all member's profiles that hold this rank. This will allow anyone who views your profile to see it unless either of the next two permissions are applied.
profileFields.hideFromOwnerExplanation: Granting this permission will hide the field from the member's profile that hold's this rank.
profileFields.requireModToViewExplanation: Granting this permission will require a member to have the "View Field on Other Profiles - Mod Power" in order to view the field on a profile.
profileFields.requireAdminToViewExplanation: Granting this permission will require a member to have the "View Field on Other Profiles - Admin Power" in order to view the field on a profile.
profileFields.viewModPowerExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a member to view this field on a profile with "Mod Power" in mind. See above permissions for association.
profileFields.viewAdminPowerExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a member to view this field on a profile with "Admin Power" in mind. See above permissions for association.
profileFields.allowOwnerToEditExplanation: Granting this permission will allow the member that holds this rank to edit this field on their profile. If the "Hides Field from Profile Owner" permission is granted it will ignore this permission as it won't be visible.
profileFields.editOthersExplanation: Granting this permission will allow the member that holds this rank to edit this field on any member profiles that their able to view.

navigation.viewDashboardBtnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to see the Dashboard button on the side navigation bar.
navigation.viewDriveBtnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to see the Drive butotn on the side navigation bar (if the 'Modify All Documents (Drive)' permission is granted this is already inherited).
navigation.viewCalendarBtnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to see the Calendar button on the side navigation bar.
navigation.viewRostersBtnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to see the Rosters buttons on the side navigation bar.
navigation.viewProfileBtnExplanation: Granting this permission will allow a user to see the Community Profile button on the side navigation bar.

pages.viewExplanation: Granting this permissions will allow the member that holds this rank to view this page as the page is set to PRIVATE.

menu.limitNotice: 已达到拥有社区的限制。
menu.leaveCommunityMessage: Are you sure you want to leave this community? You will no longer be able to access any of the community's content.

tooltips.joinButton: Have a community ID? Join a community here!
tooltips.discoveryButton: Looking for a community? Discover communities using Sonoran CMS!
tooltips.createButton: Looking to use Sonoran CMS with your community? Proceed here.

Click the green button to create your new community!
menu.tagline:
A Community tagline is like a hashtag.
They help people discover and connect with your community!
menu.comImage: Upload a logo for your new community!
menu.comBanner: Upload a banner for your new community!
menu.comDescription:
Let others learn about your new community.
Give a brief description of what it's like.

forms.importClockData: 导入上班/下班打卡数据
forms.stageAutoFormReplyDescription: The stage "auto-form reply" action will automatically enter a reply when the form's stage changes to {stageName}. You can utilize the following template strings: {form_name}, {'{user_submission_link}'}, {'{submission_link}'}, {stage_name}, {submitter_com_name}, and {submitter_username} to have dynamic data within your reply.
forms.stageNotifySubmitterNotification: Stage Action: Notify Submitter via Notification
forms.stageNotifySubmitterNotificationDescript: The stage "notify submitter via notification" action will automatically send a notification to the submitter when the form's stage changes to {stageName}. You can utilize the following template strings: {form_name}, {'{user_submission_link}'}, {'{submission_link}'}, {stage_name}, {submitter_com_name}, and {submitter_username} to have dynamic data within the notification content.
forms.stageNotifySubmitterEmail: Stage Action: Notify Submitter via Email
forms.stageNotifySubmitterEmailDescription: The stage "notify submitter via email" action will automatically send a email to the submitter when the form's stage changes to {stageName}. You can utilize the following template strings: {form_name}, {'{user_submission_link}'}, {'{submission_link}'}, {stage_name}, {submitter_com_name}, and {submitter_username} to have dynamic data within the email content.
forms.stageDisableEnableRepliesDescription: The stage "disable/enable form replies" action will automatically will automatically disable/enable form replies for everyone, moderators, or administrators when the form's stage changes to {stageName}.

pastTense.noChange: {item} SET TO NOT ADD OR REMOVE FROM INDIVIDUAL

current.noChange: {item} SET NOT ADD OR REMOVE FROM INDIVIDUAL

forms.stageChangeDepartmentSlashRankDescriptio: The stage "change submitter's department/rank" action will automatically change/set the submitter's primary or secondary department and/or rank when the form's stage changes to {stageName}.
forms.stageExecuteDiscordWebhookDescription: The stage "execute discord webhook" action will automatically execute a Discord webhook when the form's stage changes to {stageName}. You can utilize the following template strings: {form_name}, {'{user_submission_link}'}, {'{submission_link}'}, {stage_name}, {submitter_com_name}, and {submitter_username} to have dynamic data within the notification content.
forms.stageActionDepartmentsRanksPriChangesDes: Primary Changes are changes only to the submitter's primary department and rank, this does not affect their secondary department(s) or rank(s).
forms.stageActionDepartmentsRanksSecChangesDes: Secondary Changes are changes only to the submitter's secondary department(s) and/or rank(s), this does not affect their primary department and rank.
forms.executeDiscordWebhookContentHint: Message sent with the Discord Webhook
forms.stageModifyCommunityStatus: Stage Action: Modify Submitter's Community Status
forms.stageModifyCommunityStatusDescription: The stage "modify submitter's community status" action will automatically will modify the submitter's status, kick or ban when the form's stage changes to {stageName}.
forms.formEditorSubtitle: Customize your community's forms right here!
forms.formSelectSubtitle: Select a form to edit or create a new one to get started!
forms.formDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{formName}"?
forms.setupFormStagesErr: This form has an invalid stage setup. It must be setup before being used
forms.secDepInputTooltip: A comma separated list of values that will show this section
forms.secRemoveConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this?
forms.stageGroupDesc: Custom Form Stages are different statuses a custom form can go through. Each "stage" can have customizable action(s) and functions.
forms.stageGroupExample: For example, if this form template is for a community application, you may want the process to be {0}

stageGroupErr.invalid: The stage with this ID has been deleted
stageGroupErr.noRoutes: This stage is unselectable. To use this stage, it must be added to the stage options of another stage
stageGroupErr.unresolved: There are unresolved errors (highlighted in red) that must be addressed before saving

forms.stageEditSubtitle: Note that editing this stage (except Default Stage & Next Stage Options) will apply to {0} forms that use this stage
forms.stageOptionsTooltip: The next stages that can be selected from this stage
forms.stageDefaultTooltip: If set, this is the default stage for forms from this template
forms.stageDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this stage? This may influence other form templates that use this stage.
forms.stageExecuteDiscordDmDescription: The stage "send Discord DM" action will automatically send the user a Discord DM when the form's stage changes to {stageName}. You can utilize the following template strings: {'{form_name}'}, {'{user_submission_link}'}, {'{submission_link}'}, {'{stage_name}'}, {'{submitter_com_name}'}, {'{submitter_username}'}, and {'{submitter_discord_ping}'} to have dynamic data within the notification content.

templateManagement.creationDescription: This creation dialog will assist you in creating a Sonoran CMS Community Template from elements from your community, you can update and remove this template at any time after creation is completed.
templateManagement.creationSelectionDescription: This creation dialog will assist you in selecting what components of your community you'd like to include in the template,  you can update and remove components from this template after creation is completed.
templateManagement.manageDescription: This manage dialog will allow you to add, remove and update elements and information of your template. Once you save any changes it will need to be re-reviewed by the Sonoran CMS Development Team.

CustomizationEditor.customizationtooltipsenablediscoveryfirs: Community Discovery must be enabled to use this
CustomizationEditor.customizationtooltipscanbumpdiscovery: Bring your community to the top of the discovery page!
CustomizationEditor.customizationtooltipsdiscoveryselectform: This will automatically show this form for submission if a user joins the community through the Sonoran CMS Community Discovery system. The form must be the type of New Member Application.
CustomizationEditor.commonblanktemplatedescription: Selecting Use Blank Template below will set your community blank, meaning youll have no configured departments, forms, rosters, etc.
CustomizationEditor.commonconfirmtemplatedesc: You can pick and choose what you want to import and what you dont want to import by checking everything you want. The toggle input at the bottom determines how you want to use the template import—giving you the option to replace or add to your current departments, rosters, etc.
